products.title: Plant
products.description: This is the house plant to decorate your home

products.title: iPhone 14 pro
products.description: Spider plants have long, arching leaves that can be green or striped green and white. Small flowers form at the end of the leaves of mature plants, which can then form plantlets to start new potted plants.
